newsitem.title: USA: Pollo Tropical sees FY96 net loss.
newsitem.headline: Pollo Tropical sees FY96 net loss.

text.p: Pollo Tropical Inc said Wednesday it expects to take a material charge of about $0.50 per share in the fourth quarter from the closing of six restaurants.
The $4 million charge is expected to lead to a net loss for the 1996 fiscal year, the company said.
The restaurants to be closed are in Chicago, Long Island and Tampa, areas that were discribed as being outside Pollo Tropical's core market.
Instead, the company said it intends to focus on restaurants in south and central Florida, as well as franchised restaurants in the Caribbean and Latin America.
In 1997, the company plans a moderate expansion in its core Florida markets by adding four restaurants.
